headline: Caesars price target lowered to $57 from $59 at JMP Securities
summary: JMP Securities lowered the firm’s price target on Caesars (CZR) to $57 from $59 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. After touring and speaking with several general managers of land-based gaming casinos in Louisiana and Mississippi, JMP believes trends are stable, with no change in November gaming revenue compared to year-to-date trends in Louisiana and Mississippi, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
